Reviews.Title: From Venenezuela
Reviews.Author: Spike_Vam
Reviews.Content: nice device, phone work movistar and movilnet 3g, digitel 2g... until now everything ok, just one thing low memory ram.

Reviews.Title: Great Value
Reviews.Author: C. Smith "Meg"
Reviews.Content: This is my very first smartphone and I am using it in conjunction with a prepaid phone service. So far, I have been completely satisfied with this phone. I have noticed that the download speeds are very slow when using data; however, they remain fairly quick when I am hooked into my home Wi-Fi. I would highly recommend this product to a person who is transitioning from a feature phone and is looking for an inexpensive option to own a smartphone. I have only put a handful of apps on the phone since I read that too many apps have a tendency to overload this phone. All in all, though, I couldn't be happier with my decision to purchase this phone. It's very attractive, works great, has incredible battery power...there's not much more I can say. If, however, you are accustomed to using an iPhone 4s with a major carrier, I would never recommend this phone since it's not capable of high speed downloads. In my opinion, this phone earns five stars. The only reason that I am rating this phone a four out of five is that I have had the opportunity to use other people's phones and have seen the difference. For a first, inexpensive smartphone, though, this is amazing!

Reviews.Title: All OKAY..but wifi problems within just 2 months...
Reviews.Author: ADITYA K.
Reviews.Content: The device worked fine with the wifi for a while..After that the wifi system died.(nothing wrong from my side)..It doesnt switch on wifi & when consulted the samsung store, they say the motherboard must be changed...Now it costs me an additional $80-100.... :(SO buy this product at ur own risk...As wifi is a very important requirement nowadays,its a thing to worry about...ELse rest all other features were working ok..

Reviews.Title: LO RECOMIENDO EXCELENTE
Reviews.Author: marlen moreno
Reviews.Content: buen teléfono lo recomiendo me llego tal cual como se muestra en la foto, con todos sus accesorios y desbloqueado totalmente nuevo, LO RECOMIENDO EXCELENTE DESBLOQUEADO

Reviews.Title: Good Stuff
Reviews.Author: Luis
Reviews.Content: I prevously owned one of those imitations from China which was a piece of crap. This is an old version of Samsung galaxy but it is GOOD

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: dawelder
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to use in Mexico. It works GREAT. I have used it with an ATT Go Phone sim card, and currently have Telcel and Movistar sim cards installed. Data is quite good on either of these also. I did not use data on ATT because of the cost. Anywhere and everywhere there is a cell phone signal in Mexico this phone works! I am VERY gald I purchased it.One comment. I had to turn the power saving feature on on the phone because without it something (I am not sure what) was eating battery very rapidly. Not a problem though, the phone still does what I neet.Five stars and a happy customer. The folks I bought it from were great as far as shipping on time etc.!

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Roberto
Reviews.Content: I received the phone according to the time and the characteristics indicated.In beginning of the phone's functions, I can be passed to the language, in my case Spanish. It's fast.The two sim cards, can work both at once or you can leave a sim card paused while the other works....this is to your choose.

Reviews.Title: Okay..
Reviews.Author: Marie
Reviews.Content: The phone was alright, I've owned quite a variety of phones and this one wasn't the fastest. I had it for about two months before it slipped out of my hand and the whole screen shattered, making it useless. I would've thought about buying another one, but I didn't want to spend that much money on it again. It was my fault for not getting a case in the first place. It arrived fast, and unopened. Great. Just, don't make the same mistake I did and drop it on the screen. That was my first time dropping it.

Reviews.Title: is a good basic phone
Reviews.Author: cmarin
Reviews.Content: This is a good basic phone. Work good for the basic app. It have a nice screem and good size.

Reviews.Content: excellent product. meets specified by the seller. I like a lot. is highly recommended because of its versatility and new technology that works simultaneously dual sim.. i love it

Reviews.Title: Don't Purchase
Reviews.Author: Peaches Dinnoo
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with this item. Purchase this phone for Christmas was quite excited when I first got it. However the phone give problems from the start, sticking freezing, moving slow when going from one app to the other. I would not advise anyone to purchase this phone if you do however you do so at your own risk. I am thankful though that I was be getting back my money for this item.

Reviews.Content: it have excelent screen with very good resolution with super amoled screen, also processor speed is quit acceptable, i go accordance with the performance of the phone

Reviews.Content: does not have enough ram memory and can not download applpication in memory card, is an adroid 4.0, good applications but it does not respond fast enough.

Reviews.Title: It is not original, but a fake.
Reviews.Author: M. Bank
Reviews.Content: The product is not a real Samsung phone, but a fake. The phone fell down and the display was broken after the first hit against the floor. It doesn't happen to an original Samsung phone.

Reviews.Title: Just love it
Reviews.Author: Alan Cruz "alanof"
Reviews.Content: As promised, the device works just fine in the country I'm located now GT, the look and feel is friendly, battery consumption as good as a smart phone can give, it lacks of advanced features but is ok if you only need for basic operations like calling, browsing internet  SMS, whatsapp, etc.
